Welcome to the Webel IT Australia test template for PrimeFaces. Please immediately perform these first steps:
  1. In NetBeans IDE rename the project:
    • From 'Webel_PrimeFaces_test_template'
    • To '[YourCompany]_PrimeFaces_test_[testname]'
    • If you are preparing a test for a specific issue support ticket
      consider using the issue number in the [testname] part.
    You can do this in the main NetBeans IDE Projects window
    by right-clicking on the project and choosing Rename....
    Please make sure you tick/select the [x] Also Rename Project Folder option !
  2. Then clean and build and run your renamed test web app
    before making any Java of JSF/XHTML code modifications.
  3. Please DO NOT adapt Java code in com.webel.test packages directly !
    If you are going to adapt any of the Java code please create new packages first
    for your organisation, copy Webel classes into them, and re-author them.
